channel.title: Need Help
channel.description: Okay so i have got my webclient working good on my website so how do i get it where other players can connect? kinda confused on that part. Also when i connect to my server it doesnt show my name up in my "character" file on my source. And i need a tut on how to make my server where when they go to the webclient it auto downloads the cache for them. the Last three parts im stuck on people either a quick tv to help fix or a very detailed tut. :D Will appreciate every bit of information i get.
